summary: REQ-58 appears implemented in DemoPreviewBanner by forcing a solid white background for the SelectTrigger and SelectContent in light mode while preserving dark-mode styling. REQ-59 cannot be confirmed from the provided (truncated) diff content for SchoolTrainingPage; there is no direct evidence showing the Training Visit dialog/form container background change. The diff also introduces an unrequested demo-data reset warning banner feature in DemoPreviewBanner.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the Training module Training Visit create/edit form container to have a solid white background in light mode (entire form container), while preserving existing styling behavior in dark mode.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff snippet for the Training page is truncated before the dialog JSX/styles are shown, so there is no direct evidence that the dialog/form container background was updated to solid white in light mode (and preserved in dark mode).

hallucinated_features.description: Added a demo-data reset warning banner with auto-hide timer and dismiss action in the Demo/Preview banner.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for light-mode white backgrounds for the role switcher dropdown and the Training Visit form container; it explicitly lists no redesign/logic changes beyond background adjustments. The reset-warning alert and related state/effects are additional behavior not requested.
